headline: McDONALD'S ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
summary: Today, McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock payable on September 16, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 2, 2025.

raw.headline: McDONALD'S ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
raw.summary: Today, McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock payable on September 16, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 2, 2025.

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line appoints chief digital, tech officer
summary: Daniel Henry comes to the company after leading transformation efforts at McDonald's and American Airlines.
